issue.title: Low frame rates from MultisenseSL cameras in VRC Task1

content.raw:
Hmm we tested on 3 different systems and we're getting different behaviour on every machine while running the same graphics card. 

My system with default Ogre: ~15fps on every task (didn't test vsync here as i'm running 1.8.1 right now which doesn't suffer from this problem).

system2: low fps on every task, unchecking Sync to VBlank doesn't change anything.

system3: low fps on task1, normal fps on task2 and 3 (3 uses the same grass plane as task 1) - unchecking Sync to VBlank doesn't change fps.

Hmm we tested on 3 different systems and we're getting different behaviour on every machine while running the same graphics card.

My system with default Ogre: ~15fps on every task (didn't test vsync here as i'm running 1.8.1 right now which doesn't suffer from this problem).

system2: low fps on every task, unchecking Sync to VBlank doesn't change anything.

system3: low fps on task1, normal fps on task2 and 3 (3 uses the same grass plane as task 1) - unchecking Sync to VBlank doesn't change fps.
